info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 11 at 3:24PM MDT until July 12 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures of 95 to 101. * WHERE...Clarkston, Pomeroy, Gifford, Clarkston Heights, Lapwai, Culdesac, and Lewiston. * WHEN...From Noon to 9 PM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may lead to heat illnesses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will be slow to cool off Tuesday evening with overnight lows in the mid to upper 60s. This will elevate the heat risk for those that are heat sensitive or lack effective cooling.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in air-conditioning, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
